verbs.description: Iran 's president [V: is] warning President Trump that pulling America out of the nuclear deal with world powers would be a “ historic regret . ”
[ARG0: Iran 's president] is [V: warning] [ARG2: President Trump] [ARG1: that pulling America out of the nuclear deal with world powers would be a “ historic regret] . ”
Iran 's president is warning [ARG0: President Trump] that [V: pulling] [ARG1: America] [ARG2: out of the nuclear deal with world powers] would be a “ historic regret . ”
Iran 's president is warning President Trump that pulling America out of the nuclear deal with world powers [V: would] be a “ historic regret . ”
Iran 's president is warning President Trump that [ARG1: pulling America out of the nuclear deal with world powers] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: be] [ARG2: a “ historic regret] . ”
